title: How Agility Robotics uses artificial intelligence, from their humanoid 'Digit' to everyday workflow
description: Robots like Digit are a growing pursuit among robotics companies that are trying to bring humanoids into everyday life, and specifically into the home as helpers.
content:
Digit the humanoid robot is 5 feet 9 inches (175cm) tall and lives in warehouses, helping its human coworkers move and stack boxes up to 35 pounds (15.87kg). It also "smiles" and waves.
Robots like Digit are a growing pursuit among robotics companies... [6029 chars]

title: Man who lost key motion in Elon Musk suit alleges judge used faulty AI
description: A man who sued Elon Musk for defamation and securities fraud has alleged that a San Francisco judge allowed artificial intelligence software to introduce multiple errors into a recent order that torpedoed a key motion in the man's lawsuit.
content:

title: Novel AI tool offers prognosis for patients with head and neck cancer
description: A team led by investigators at Mass General Brigham and Dana-Farber Cancer Institute has developed and validated an artificial intelligence (AI)–based noninvasive tool that can predict the likelihood that a patient's oropharyngeal cancer—a type of head and neck cancer that develops in the throat—will spread, thereby signaling which patients should receive aggressive treatment.

title: Nvidia Strikes a Deal With Groq, an A.I. Chip Start-Up
description: Nvidia will license Groq’s technology and hire its top executives, adding to the Silicon Valley giant’s heft in artificial intelligence chips.
content:
Nvidia, the maker of artificial intelligence chips and the world’s most valuable public company, agreed to license the technology of the chip start-up Groq and hire its top executives.

description: Nvidia Corp. agreed to a licensing deal with artificial intelligence startup Groq, furthering its investments in companies connected to the AI boom and gaining the right to add a new type of technology to its products.
